manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Gold Butterfly Boxed Stationery Sheets Enjoy the fine art of letter writing with designer stationery sheets and matching envelopes

Add flair to your personal correspondence Understated design A lovely little butterfly is stamped in gold at the top of each crisp ivory stationery sheet. Embossing lends dimension and calls attention to detail. Board box with clear acetate lid contains 30 letter sheets and 24 matching envelopes. Superior stationery sheets Write with confidence. Substantial smooth-finish writing sheets take a variety of pens beautifully. Fountain pens glide over the page. 24 matching envelopes Classic ivory stationery envelopes. Envelopes are constructed of quality paper.

Beautiful stationery is a pleasure to use Versatile design is suitable for a variety of occasions Keep a box on hand for whenever a handwritten letter is warranted. Sheet size (5-3/4” wide x 7-3/4” high) allows you to write expansively. Exceptional value Premium boxed set features crisp, smooth-finish sheets and stationery envelopes constructed of quality paper. Stationery set comes in an attractive box suitable for gift-giving. Brighten their day Nothing is more personal than a handwritten letter. Stay in touch! About our Gold Butterfly Letter-Perfect Stationery Sheets: Set comes with 30 designer letter sheets Includes 24 matching stationery envelopes Each sheet measures 5-3/4” wide x 7-3/4” high Stationery set comes in a sturdy matching box with a clear acetate lid

Gold Dots Stationery Set (Boxed Stationery) Butterflies: Letter-perfect Stationery (Letter-perfect Stationery Series) Watercolor Birds Stationery Set (Boxed Stationery) Fuchsia Blooms Stationery Set (Boxed Stationery) Hydrangeas Stationery Set (Boxed Stationery) Blue Elegance Stationery

Our Company History In 1928, at the age of twenty-two, Peter Beilenson began printing books on a small press in the basement of his parents’ home in Larchmont, New York. Peter—and later, his wife, Edna—sought to create fine books that sold at prices even a pauper could afford. Today, still family owned and operated, Peter Pauper Press continues to honor our founders’ legacy—and our customers’ expectations—of beauty, quality, and value. Image: Peter Pauper Press headquarters, circa 1948.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Nice Stationery
reviews.reviewText: I have a friend that I am currently unable to reach by email or text on a consistent or reliable basis, so I find myself writing letters again. I didn’t want 8 1/2 x 11, office paper, because that’s not really appropriate for hand written letters to a friend or family member. So I purchased some nice Monarch-sized paper and envelopes and this boxed stationery set. The gold embossed butterfly at the top is pretty and understated, which is exactly what I wanted. The paper and envelopes have a nice weight and finish, and the ink from my pen glides nicely across it. The stationery is nicely packaged and you get a fair amount for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love fine stationery!
reviews.reviewText: This was simple and elegant - perfect for what I needed it for - an inclusion into a sympathy card. It’s not easy to find quality stationery anymore. This came in a day and met my expectations delightfully.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple and lovely
reviews.reviewText: Beautiful with an elegant touch that adds a dash of style

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The item came packaged well with no issues on the paper or envelopes. The paper is of a decent thickness and works well with a fountain pen. The envelopes are also thick. The foil detailing is very nice and there are no issues in the foiling. 10/10

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Gorgeous, Inexpensive Stationery
reviews.reviewText: This was a very satisfying purchase, and I am likely to repurchase it as soon as I run out.The paper was sufficiently think, and the ink did not run or blot on it. The butterfly engraving added a very nice touch to the letter, as it kept the page from being blank aside from text while not drawing unnecessary attention to itself.I was also very pleased with the paper to envelope ratio, as most letters (in my experience) do not require more than one sheet of paper, and, as it was 30 sheets to 24 envelopes, I find that I am not running out of one much faster than the other. This is quite a relief, as in many previous purchases I have found myself unsure of how to use leftover sheets of paper.The cost was by far the greatest attraction to this paper. Many other Amazon sellers (*cough**cough* Crane & Co. *cough*) offer half the amount of stationery at double the price, and the difference in quality is hardly ever visible.The only issue I have with this product is the back of the envelope. The adhesive flap goes horizontally across, instead of coming down from the top corners and meeting in the middle. I prefer to seal my letters with wax, and the end result looks more appealing in the latter situation. However, this is purely a personal issue, and, as the back of the envelopes were shown on the pictures given, I cannot really complain about this minor fault.All in all, I am so glad to have found this stationary and seller, as the quality and cost of this product are unbelievably tantalizing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have used this stationary 3 or 4 times already. The butterfly is tastefully small and delicate.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 21, 2013
reviews.reviewText: Arrived all in one piece, packaged nice, paper has quality feel and thickness to it. Foil butterfly looks beautiful and seems in no danger of peeling off. Very lovely stationary, I would order from them again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this stationery and will definitely buy more from them. The one I got is very high end.
Quel beau papier délicat et de qualité:)
The butterflies have gold details on them! The paper is thick and they are good either on their own or as extras for other letters. I recommend
This item delivered more than I expected. I'm more than pleased.
